name: PAYDAY: Crime War
description:
PAYDAY: Crime War is officially live! Grab your best gun and get ready for this action packed shooting game!

Join in on the official PAYDAY® experience with an all new mobile twist! Heist with friends in the best co-op first-person shooter on mobile. Take on other heisters for the first time ever in fast 4v4 PvP game modes! Grab your mask, join a crew, and heist your way to the ultimate Payday!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE TODAY!

10 MINUTE CLASSIC HEISTS
Browse the Crime.Net database of available jobs and take on classic heists from Payday: The Heist® and Payday 2® with a whole new mobile twist. Crew up with friends and choose to go stealth or loud, working together to execute your strategy and pull off the perfect heist! Pre-plan carefully, heists will be different each time, adding depth and complexity for an ever-changing experience.

JOIN THE CRIME WAR
Join a gang and take on other heisters from around the world in unique 4v4 game modes. Climb the ranks and battle for control of the city in an all-out crime war. Support your crew with a rain of fire, or call the shots and lead them to victory!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR HEISTER
Unlock and earn dozens of your favorite heisters, weapons, masks, and awesome outfits that can be used to customize your loadouts. Upgrade your skill tree to suit your playstyle and become a legendary heister! Choose the best loadout to maximize your PAYDAY!

FREE TO PLAY ON MOBILE
Experience the thrill of the world’s most beloved heist game, now on your phone for easy on-the-go fun. Console quality HD gaming with customizable controls, voice and text chat, and thrilling 3D graphics and sound. New features, heists, and weapons will continue to be added as the Crime War grows.

Have what it takes to compete with the best? Download PAYDAY®: CRIME WAR now!

LET’S DO THIS!
